title: Crypto Action in Senate Remains on Back Burner: Sources
description: Despite keen interest from U.S. Senate Democrats such as Elizabeth Warren (D-Mass.) to deal with the illicit movement of funds in crypto, there's no immediate action planned in the committee that would need to get it rolling, according to two sources familiar with the plans.

title: Why Circle’s USDC Is Dumping Tron
description: It could be part of a long-time realignment separating compliant and gray-market crypto, says Daniel Kuhn.

title: Sam Bankman-Fried Replaces Lawyers Ahead of Sentencing
description: Sam Bankman-Fried replaced his former lawyers, Mark Cohen and Christian Everdale, as he’s headed into sentencing negotiations.

title: Pudgy Penguins Have Sold $10 Million Worth of Toys—Now Walmart Wants More
description: A second line of Pudgy Penguins NFT toys will launch in an expanded pact with Walmart that includes over 50% more stores.

title: Texas company mounts court challenge to SEC crypto authority
description:
The parent company of a yet-to-launch crypto exchange teamed up with the Crypto Freedom Alliance of Texas in hopes of heading off securities trading charges.

The Crypto Freedom Alliance of Texas (CFAT) and digital asset company Lejilex have sued the United States Securities and Exchange Commission (SEC), demanding that the court rule on the status of digital assets sold on the secondary market.

CFAT and Lejilex filed suit against the SEC in the Northern Texas District Court in Fort Worth on Feb. 21. Lejilex is planning to launch a crypto exchange called Legit.Exchange. According to his LinkedIn profile, Lejilex co-founder Mike Wawszczak is an attorney and general counsel of Alliance DAO.

The suit alleges one count against the SEC, citing the Declaratory Judgment Act and a 2007 case as a precedent. The plaintiffs are asking the court for several rulings, including:

Read more

title: Pushd presale draws investors, XRP and BNB holders exploring

title: More $6.2M Drained from 22 LastPass Hack Victims: Details
description:
Users of the password manager LastPass continue to bear the consequences of their earlier reliance on the service. Recently, renowned crypto investigator ZachXBT disclosed that a new round of crypto funds has been siphoned from individuals who have had exposure to LastPass. According to the report, an additional $6.2 million has been drained from victims […]
